attributes.action: Convicted rioters should loose all benefits (applicable to the whole UK, not only London)
attributes.additional_details: Any persons convicted of criminal acts during the current riots should have all financial benefits removed. If the convicted is a minor, his/her parents would lose the benefits.  No tax payer should have to contribute to those who have destroyed property, stolen from their community and shown a disregard for the country that provides for them.
